decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of  five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings. | The proposed windows in the eastern elevation of the new extension approved (adjacent to number 11 Manton Avenue) shall contain only obscure glass and shall be permanently fixed shut.  REASON: To protect the living conditions of the neighbouring property
description: Two storey extension to side of house and single storey extension to rear (revised design)
